text: 8.30: Ro 9.24; 1 Ko 6.11; Ef 4.4; 1 Pi 2.9Ana mba fhum farasegi gumgi, ana vhɨra mben kamgi. Ana mba kamgi gumgi, ana Krais muuŋgi ŋaarar panan, ana tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir mben kaai. Ana mba tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui zɨn kaai gumgi gu mbigi, ana bɨɨŋbɨɨn vhuun mbe ndɨɨv, vhɨra won zɨ bakɨmen mben nɨɨnga.
